pageProduct.name: Thompson's Cod Liver Oil 100 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Cod-Liver Oil helps maintain healthy immune function.

Thompson's Cod-Liver Oil provides a natural source of Vitamin A, Vitamin D and important Omega-3 fatty acids to help maintain healthy immune function, healthy eyesight.

Size: 100caps

KEY FEATURES

• Natural source of Vitamins A and D and important Omega-3 fatty acids
• Helps to maintain healthy immune function
• Helps to maintain healthy eyesight

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all sources is 700mcg
retinol equivalents for women and 900mcg retinol equivalents for men.
WARNING - When taken in excess of 3000mcg retinol equivalents, Vitamin A can cause birth defects. If you are pregnant, or considering becoming pregnant, do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist.
Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet

CAUTION

Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS
Cod-Liver Oil: 500mg
equiv. Vitamin A: 138mcg RE
equiv. Colecalciferol(Vitamin D3) 1.21mcg (48IU)

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
